positive_comments: The information presented in the module "The Role of Artificial Intelligence in Modern HR" was very comprehensive and informative. The speaker was also very clear and easy to understand.
improvement_opportunities: While the module provided valuable information that HR professionals can utilize in their day-to-day functions, the delivery of the information could have been less dry and matter of fact, and more engaging. I am a big believer in "gamification" of information - I truly think that learning doesn't have to be boring and dry. In fact, the more engaging and fun learning is, the more likely it is to be impactful and memorable for learners.

positive_comments: The module "Why HR Professionals Need to Embrace AI" repeats some of the elements in the first module that I reviewed but also aims to convince HR teams on the importance of adapting AI into their functions and services.  Again, the information and content were pretty clear and easy to understand.
improvement_opportunities: Where this module fell a little short was its failure to clearly draw lines to illustrate the "why". The speaker made sweeping statements on what AI can do without giving clear illustrations or explanations in several instances. For example, on the statement that AI can "improve employee engagement" through "employee sentiment analysis," which isn't explained.
